name: Elf's Gold Run
description:
In this game you have to steal the cauldron of a baddy leprechaun in a race, reach the cauldron before the leprechaun to win!

You run automatically but you can control your speed by pressing A and D keys.

Jumps from platform to platform by pressing space bar, the longer you press and hold the higher you'll get.

You can place platforms with left click spending coins you can find during the race.

-->Controls<--
  • A and D to reduce or increase your speed.
  • Space bar to jump.
  • Left click to place platforms.
  • R to restart the game.
  • ESC to close the game.
Credits:
  • Eacrow - Programmer
  • Flamaroth - Composer - (Bandcamp)
  • Chikorita - Artist
  • PJK - Artist

This game was originally made for the game jam Weekly Game Jam - Week 114
